vclaim: A video shows a crying woman holding an onion while telling a reporter that she had been Maced during a riot.
title: Did ‘Elizabeth From Knoxville’ Use an ‘Onion Towel’ To Make Herself Cry?
subtitle: A video of a woman who participated in rioting at the U.S. Capitol went viral after some noticed that she appeared to be a holding an onion.
author: Dan Evon
